name: Blocky Cars Traffic Drive GT
description:
Feel like a true champion driving as fast as possible in the blocky highway.

If you love traffic racer games, bloky pixel graphics and having a lot of fun, this is the game you've been waiting for!

As you go faster and further on the highway you will win cash and you'll be able to buy better and faster Bloky Pixel cars! You can overtake other cars and you will win more points and more cash!

There's no time to lose! Choose your car and show everybody that no one can reach you!

◉ KEY FEATURES ◉

- Blocky Pixel Cars!
- Extreme speed!
- Four lanes highway!
- Very simple controls!
- Incredible graphics!
- Leaderboards and achievements!

◉ GAMEPLAY ◉

- Tilt or Touch to steer
- Touch gas button to accelerate
- Touch brake button to slow down

◉ TIPS ◉

- The faster you drive the more scores you get
- When driving over 100 kmh, overtake cars closely to get bonus scores and cash

Have endless fun by downloading this Blocky Traffic Racer game.

Do not forget to give us a review!
